src:
【子涵名醫低調戀5】與名醫前男友對話曝光　子涵：我對你還有愛
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by 李育材
李光輝時常上談話節目、接受媒體專訪，算是醫界名嘴。他曾參與「華岡之狼」的精神鑑定，堅持不能假釋，提倡性侵犯應採取「化學去勢」；還曾在擔任關西培靈醫院院長時，注射血癌細胞到自己體內，證明注射自體免疫細胞就有免疫力防癌，遭廣大輿論批評，辭去職務。





李光輝（右）的生日派對冠蓋雲集，藝人楊麗菁（左）也是座上賓。（讀者提供）

除了精神醫學專業，李光輝後來經營生醫公司，鑽研免疫細胞，獲得不少專利。另外，他的幾件官司也都曾鬧上新聞，包括藝人王靜瑩的前夫陳威陶涉嫌侵占李借名登記的1,000萬元股票，陳被依背信罪判刑6個月、得易科罰金。








2017年，李光輝捲入販售未上市股票案，被控吸金2.8億元，遭台北地檢署起訴。對此，李堅持清白，認為檢察官為了升官，放消息給媒體，把他打成當年四大吸金案主嫌之一，就算未來他獲判無罪，名譽早毀於一旦。
李光輝提供與翁子涵交往時的對話紀錄，可見2人當時的辦公室戀情的確愛的低調。即便分手後，翁子涵似乎還忘不了李光輝對她的好，言談間甚至還對李表示「對你還是有愛」，更向李光輝抱怨外界對她的誤解。
更新時間｜2019.11.05 16:15
text:
[Zihan famous doctor low-key love 5] and the famous doctor's ex-boyfriend dialogue exposure Sub-han: I still have love for you
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by Li Yucai
Li Guanghui often talks on the show and accepts media interviews. He has participated in the spiritual identification of "Women of Huagang", insisted that he could not be released on parole, and advocated "chemical castration" in promoting sexual assault. He also injected blood cancer cells into his body when he was the dean of Guanxi Peiling Hospital, proving autoimmune injection. The cells have immunity against cancer, and they have been criticized by the masses and resigned.





Li Guanghui (right)'s birthday party is gathered, and artist Yang Lijing (left) is also a guest. (provided by the reader)

In addition to the psychiatric profession, Li Guanghui later operated a biomedical company, researched immune cells, and obtained many patents. In addition, several of his lawsuits have also made news, including the artist Wang Jingying’s ex-husband, Chen Weitao, who was suspected of encroaching on the 10 million yuan registered by Li’s name. Chen was sentenced to six months in violation of the letter of credit and was awarded a fine.








In 2017, Li Guanghui was involved in the sale of unlisted shares and was accused of absorbing 280 million yuan in money and was sued by the Taipei District Inspection Department. In this regard, Li insisted on innocence, thinking that the prosecutor in order to promote the official, put the news to the media, and labeled him as one of the four major suspects of the year, even if he was acquitted in the future, the reputation was destroyed.
Li Guanghui provided a dialogue record with Weng Zihan when he was in contact with Weng Zihan. It can be seen that the office romance of the two people at that time was really low-key. Even after breaking up, Weng Zihan seems to have forgotten that Li Guanghui is good to her. Even during the talks, Li said that he still has "love for you" and complained to Li Guanghui about the misunderstanding of her.
Update time|2019.11.05 16:15
